mapper.select: /* id="selectUser" resultType="string" parameterType="string" */ select l.enc from TB_LOGIN as l where l.user=#{user};
/* id="selectPhoneList" resultType="com.thereal.domain.entity.PhoneEntity" */ select p.phone, p.comment from TB_PHONE as p;
/* id="selectChannelList" resultType="com.thereal.domain.entity.ChannelEntity" */ select c.seq, c.channel_name, c.sender_key from TB_CHANNEL as c order by c.seq;

/* id="selectTemplateList" resultType="com.thereal.domain.dto.TemplateDTO" */ select s.sub_id, t.template_code, c.channel_name as channel, t.phone, t.msg from TB_SUB_ID as s, TB_TEMPLATE AS t, TB_CHANNEL AS c where s.template_code = t.template_code and t.channel_seq = c.seq;
mapper.insert: insert into TB_SUB_ID( sub_id, template_code, comment ) values( #{sub_id}, #{template_code}, #{comment} )
insert into TB_TEMPLATE( template_code, channel_seq, msg, phone, comment ) values( #{template_code}, #{channel_name}, #{msg}, #{phone}, #{comment} )
